title: Tom Brady Owes You Nothing
description:
Tom Brady throws all New England Patriots fans into a frenzy after his retirement note did not include any references to the team or New England (00:01:00). Kayce Smith checks in to discuss her anger over Adam Schefter doing his job (00:30:00). Brian Flores sues the NFL alleging racism in the New York Giants hiring process (00:50:00). Concessions Week kicks off and Kirk is fired up about Chris' lack of concern over the budget (01:07:00). Donald J. Trump calls in to confirm that he is running in 2024 & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
